Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 17 Piercing and can knock prone

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Gibbering Mouther makes 1 Bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle
Other Actions.Action 2: Blinding Spittle, The Mouther spits a glob that explodes into blinding light

Abilities.Ability 1: Aberrant Ground, The Gibbering Mouther spreads its doughy flesh body wherever it moves, creating difficult terrain around it
Abilities.Ability 2: Gibbering, The Mouther babbles incoherently with all of its mouths.  Creatures that hear the gibbering can become confused
